page.title: 16Leisure
page.content: 0440014 Longparish{cricket club}is well-known in the region having reached the final of the Whitbread Village Teams competition in 1980.This year the club has a membership of 35 and raises two teams. Games are played on the club ground.H.Priors also has a cricket team and its own ground A{social club}meets in buildings behind the Longparish village hall.Membership is open to villagers and activities available include billiards,pool and darts with the use of two gambling machines.{ {Keep Fit}classes are held at the Village Hall once a week. The Longparish{Women's Institute} meets monthly at the village hall with 26 members this year.They have raised money for Cancer Research and helped with the Best Kept Village Competition
